description.@en: Although you may not harness the Magicks granted by a deity, you are no less blessed by your god. Living a hardscrabble life upon the road, the religious habit you wear and symbol you carry are blessed, safeguarding you against wrongdoers.

effect.@en: Whenever you wear the robes of your office and bear a holy symbol around your neck, add +1 to both your Damage and Peril Thresholds. Furthermore, you may add the Defensive Quality to any weapon you wield.
